title: Business trip
description: Travel between the home and the place of the professional activity, when they are essential for the exercise of activities which cannot be organized in the form of homeworking or professional displacements which cannot be deferred

title: Doing grocery
description: Travel to make purchases of supplies necessary for professional activity and purchases of basic necessities in shops which activities remain authorized (list on government.fr)

title: Health reason
description: Doctor appointment and care that cannot be provided remotely and that cannot be deferred; Doctor appointment and care of patients with a long-term condition

title: Assistance to vulnerable people
description: Travel for compelling family reasons, for assistance to vulnerable persons or childcare

title: Brief trip
description: Brief trips, within the limit of one hour daily and within a maximum radius of 1 kilometer around home, linked either to the individual physical activity of the people, to the exclusion of any collective sporting practice and any proximity to other people, either to walk with the only people living in the same home, or the needs of pets

title: General interest missions
description: Participation in missions of general interest at the request of the administrative authority
